channel.title: Stack Overflow on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil
channel.description: Recent content in Stack Overflow on Coding Blog By Arnab Shil

item.title: How to Ask Questions in Stack Overflow
item.description: Stack Overflow (SO) is the biggest platform for developers’ questions and answers, yet one-third of the questions remain unanswered. Most often, the feedback I get from people who are answering for the first time is that they are afraid to ask questions or get a lot of downvotes. As a contributor at SO, I feel biased toward the contributors as I see many questions on the platform which are not up to the mark.
